definition: to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The deemed method may not be used before an enterprise commences operations.
sentences.chinese: 要禁止在企业生产经营开始之前采取事先核定的办法。

sentences.english: From 2005, data of railways were re-approved by Lanzhou Railway Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 2005年起铁路数据由兰州铁路局重新核定划分。

sentences.english: A document evidencing the approval of the code of practices by MOTC.
sentences.chinese: 公司营业规章经交通部核定之证明文件。

sentences.english: After the adoption of the review, and so on, the two sides to begin formal cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 经本校学术交流与合作委员会审查通过后陈校长核定。

sentences.english: The duty of each agency shall be authorized by the competent education authority.
sentences.chinese: 各单位之职掌，由各该主管教育行政机关核定之。

sentences.english: Please advice us sending date of the sample for my buyer approval.
sentences.chinese: 经我方卖商核定，请告知我们样品的寄出日期。

sentences.english: It is prohibited to set up chop and seal engraving stalls outside the places checked and ratified by the License.
sentences.chinese: 禁止在《许可证》核定的地点以外设立印章刻制摊点。

sentences.english: Awards are provided for one year and must be re-applied yearly.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金每次核定一学年，须逐年申请。

sentences.english: Awards are provided for one academic year and must be re-applied yearly.
sentences.chinese: 奖学金每次核定一学年，须逐年申请。

sentences.english: If the loans exceed the surplus, the total investment in projects shall be reexamined by the original examination and approval departments.
sentences.chinese: 超出差额的，须经原审批部门重新核定项目总投资。

sentences.english: After the credit line is approved, RMB loan will be extended to you.
sentences.chinese: 核定授信额度后，我行向贵公司发放人民币贷款。

sentences.english: Checked that hospital bed 60, the Pu thoracic surgery year surgery quantity surpasses 1900.
sentences.chinese: 核定病床60张，普胸外科年手术量超过1900台。

sentences.english: The admission roster will be approved by the Admission Committee according to the recommendation of the concerned departments or institutes.
sentences.chinese: 录取名单由招生委员会依各系所审查结果核定。

sentences.english: III. Canceling the checked and ratified operation administration of the processing with imported steel.
sentences.chinese: 取消钢材进料加工的核定经营管理。

definition: to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to report for criticism/to submit for approval to higher authority
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
to state explicitly in writing/to specify/to stipulate
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
